meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Quantities of alcoholic liquor exempted from duty

subsection.leadIn: For the purpose of section 34A of the Ordinance and regulation 12(1)(ea) of the Dutiable Commodities Regulations (Cap. 109 sub. leg. A), alcoholic liquor that is either— (L.N. 35 of 2010)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: imported by a passenger of any ship, aircraft, train or vehicle for the passenger’s own use and in the passenger’s baggage; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: bought by the passenger for the passenger’s own use at a licensed warehouse located at any place approved by the Commissioner in the arrival area at an entry point in Hong Kong,

subsection.continued: is exempted from duty in accordance with this section.

subsection.leadIn: In the case of a passenger who—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: holds a Hong Kong identity card;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: is of the age of 18 or above; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: has spent 24 hours or longer outside Hong Kong,

subsection.continued: the alcoholic liquor referred to in subsection (1) is exempted from duty to the extent of 1 litre.

subsection.leadIn: In the case of a passenger who—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: does not hold a Hong Kong identity card; but

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: is of the age of 18 or above,

subsection.continued: the alcoholic liquor referred to in subsection (1) is exempted from duty to the extent of 1 litre.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Quantities of tobacco exempted from duty

subsection.leadIn: For the purpose of section 34A of the Ordinance and regulation 12(1)(ea) of the Dutiable Commodities Regulations (Cap. 109 sub. leg. A), tobacco that is either—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: imported by a passenger of any ship, aircraft, train or vehicle for the passenger’s own use and in the passenger’s baggage; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: bought by the passenger for the passenger’s own use at a licensed warehouse located at any place approved by the Commissioner in the arrival area at an entry point in Hong Kong,

subsection.continued: is exempted from duty in accordance with this section.

subsection.leadIn: In the case of a passenger who is of the age of 18 or above, the tobacco referred to in subsection (1) is exempted from duty to the extent specified in one of the following paragraphs—
